titleStmt.title: Philallelpa, or, The grand characteristick whereby a man may be known to be Christ's disciple delivered in a sermon at St. Paul's, before the gentlemen of VVilts, Nov. 10, 1658, it being the day of their yearly feast, by Thomas Pierce ...
titleStmt.author: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Royston, and are to be sold by John Courtney ...,

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
